title: Descriptions: Body (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the Body subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.romaji: Kanojo no ude wa hosoi desu.

cards.english: That child has a big mouth.
cards.romaji: Ano kodomo no kuchi wa oki desu.
cards.japanese: あの子供の口は大きいです。

cards.romaji: Ano hito no kuchibiru wa atsui.
Chichi wa ago ni hige ga arimsu.
cards.japanese: 父は顎にひげがあります。

cards.romaji: O-sumo-san no ibukuro wa oki desu.
cards.japanese: お相撲さんの胃袋は大きいです。
